sentences.en: Indeed, those recalcitrant minor key songs that defy generalization about the link between tonality and mood may tell us something more important about music than the ones that conform.
sentences.cn: 事实上，否认音调和情绪联系泛化的反小调音乐告诉我们音乐里还有更重要的东西。

sentences.en: Qinyuan Pottery Xun has its own features and styles in tone color , interval and tonality.
sentences.cn: 秦源陶埙的音程、音色和音调具有独特的风格和特点.

sentences.en: Text removes the tonality, body language and subtle cues that make a conversation interesting.
sentences.cn: 文本信息中没有能让交流更加有趣的音调、肢体语言和微妙暗示。

sentences.en: The dominant in a given key or tonality.
sentences.cn: 所给调子或音调中的主音.

sentences.en: The large negatives or slides deliver beautifully detailed images with a very nice tonality.
sentences.cn: 大底片或幻灯片保留了完美的细节,极好的色调.

sentences.en: Tonality depends on the reflected brightness of the terrain and can be electronically measured.
sentences.cn: 色调依赖于地质体反射的亮度,利用电子设备可以测量出来.

sentences.en: Visual coherence can be achieved through the use of analogous color and color tonality.
sentences.cn: 可通过利用相似色和色调来形成视觉的连贯性。

words.tran_cn: 年久变色的；有声调的，具有……音质的
沉闷的；单调的；缺乏声调的；无声的
颜色调和；呈现悦目色调

trans.tran_en: the character of a piece of music that depends on the  key  of the music and the way in which the tunes and  harmonies  are combined
